Detailed Description

Obsolete - the class Menu, which uses the AbstractActionMenuAccessor, has been replaced by the classes ItemMenu and ItemTree.

Abstract base class for a menu-accessor based on Actions. The methods MenuAccessor::First, MenuAccessor::Next and AbstractActionMenuAccessor::GetAction must be implemented.

See also:
MenuAccessor

ActionMenuAccessor
